doc:
Tom Villard https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tom_Villard 0 Thomas Louis Villard (November 19, 1953 – November 14, 1994) was an American actor. He is known for his leading role in the 1980s series We Got It Made, as well as roles in feature films One Crazy Summer, Heartbreak Ridge, My Girl, and Popcorn. Thomas_Louis_Villard ( November_19_,_1953 – November_14_,_1994 ) was an_American_actor . He is_known for his_leading_role in the_1980s_series We Got It Made , as_well_as roles in feature_films One_Crazy_Summer , Heartbreak_Ridge , My_Girl , and Popcorn .
